item.title: Multiple Large Potholes, 21st February
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Outside 85, 21st February

item.title: Numerous potholes on Horsefair Street between junction of Lyefield Road West and St Mary’s Church., 21st February
item.description:
Horsefair Street between Lyefield Road West and the intersection by St Mary’s Church is littered with numerous potholes. This stretch of road was not re-surfaced when surrounding roads were a couple of years ago. The closure of A40 has caused huge increase in traffic on this road and is in dire need of repair. Now that the A40 is back open, there is an opportunity to sort this out. The residents along here have put up with months of inconvenience due to increased traffic and now have a deteriorated road surface that is a danger to cars and people.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Horsefair Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole round road drain nest too previous repair, 21st February

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 73, Ermin Street, Brockworth, Gloucester

item.title: Bloced drain, 20th February
item.description:
The drain by the substation, between 17, 24 and 24 Wellington Lane. This was blocked after works was carried out to repair a mains leak in November, resulting in silt build up in the drain. With the recent bad weather this can cause minor flooding.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Wellington Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
